acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By using HypeHire, you agree to these terms of service.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: HypeHire provides on-demand staffing solutions connecting companies with qualified workers.

termination.title: Account Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate the relationship at any time. Data deletion follows our privacy policy.
